A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Look\, when I first saw the film I came out with issues. It's actually in hindsight that I'm starting appreciate it. There are some aspects I think are still useless (Holdo's role in the film would have a stronger impact if filled by an established character\, for instance). But the acting is on point across the board (holy crap does Driver bring it this time)\, it's visually stunning\, and it really tries to be it's own thing. I might disgree with Rian's vision\, but if this is the vision we're going to be getting I still enjoy it.
